name: Witch Space
description:
A Nebula known as the Witch Space Nebula or IC 2118 is your next destination as you try to make your way as a explorer within a vast galaxy. The hyper drive is charged and ready for you to jump! 

Controls - WASD to move the player, and Shift to run. E to interact with objects, Once in focus, press escape to unfocus on objects. Press Space to speed up text.

Pre-alpha build. This project was heavily rushed near the end so please expect bugs and a clear lack of polish. 

Was made as part of the Search for a Star challenge.  https://gradsingames.com/game-dev-challenges/
